title: HTC will make a return to ‘high-end’ Android phones in April, focused on the Metaverse
content:
After years of stagnation in the Android market, it seems HTC is ready for a comeback. According to a new report, HTC will announce a “high-end” Android smartphone next month, with a focus on the Metaverse.

more…

The post HTC will make a return to ‘high-end’ Android phones in April, focused on the Metaverse appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: HTC has confirmed that it will launch a new "high-end" Android smartphone with a focus on the Metaverse in April of this year.
